arts.ttl: Liam Manning delighted with Bristol City reaction despite 'disappointing' late Sunderland draw
arts.sum: Liam Manning was delighted to see a response from his Bristol City squad in their 1-1 draw with Sunderland, despite being left frustrated by the manner in which the Robins conceded a late equaliser at the Stadium of Light. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: Sunderland strike late to earn point
arts.sum: Patrick Roberts scored a stoppage-time equaliser as Sunderland salvaged a point to record a 1-1 Championship draw with Bristol City.
Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Sunderland and Bristol City.

arts.ttl: Patrick Roberts nets last-gasp equaliser as Sunderland earn Bristol City draw
arts.sum: Luke McNally fired City ahead in the 63rd minute after Sunderland were unable to clear the ball.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Sunderland: Luke McNally stands out as Reds denied huge away win
arts.sum: Produced block after block to deny the Black Cats, showed a bit more composure in possession than he has done in City colours and picked up a second Bristol City goal. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Sunderland as Liam Manning looks for reaction at Stadium of Light
arts.sum: The City head coach likes to rest and rotate his full-backs and with the quick turnaround between games and the fact that Pring struggled both in defence and attack against Portsmouth taken into account, it feels like Tuesday night would be the right time to make a change on the left side of the backline. Zak Vyner similarly had a tough afternoon on the south coast, but the 27-year-old has established himself as one of the first names on Manning's teamsheet this season and like both McNally and Dickie, will likely keep his place on the right side of defence.

arts.ttl: Bristol City's Championship rivals confirm surprise managerial exit as mutual agreement reached
arts.sum: Millwall have confirmed that Neil Harris will step down as their manager following the Lions' game against Middlesbrough on Saturday afternoon. Bristol City's Championship rivals confirmed in an official statement on Tuesday afternoon that they had reached a mutual agreement with the 47-year-old that will see him step down as head coach at The Den after the trip to the Riverside this weekend.

arts.ttl: Sunderland man expected to stay put in January despite lack of minutes
arts.sum: Sunderland boss Regis Le Bris has said Milan Aleksic is likely to stay put at the Stadium of… The post Sunderland man expected to stay put in January despite lack of minutes appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Former Bristol City boss Nigel Pearson shares new health update after 'learning to walk again'
arts.sum: Former Bristol City manager Nigel Pearson has taken to social media to provide a rare update on his health just over a year after he left Ashton Gate. While Pearson insists that the exact cause of his ill health remains unknown, the 61-year-old has been quick to thank his supporters for their unwavering support while he has learned to walk again.
